description.brazilian: Jogou com SpaceY e concluiu os Objetivos do Patrocinador com avaliação de desafio de 500% ou maior
description.english: Played as SpaceY and complete all Sponsor Goals on challenge rating 500% or higher
description.french: A joué SpaceY et terminé tous les objectifs de sponsor sur un challenge fixé à 500 % ou plus
description.german: Mit SpaceY alle Sponsorenziele mit einer Herausforderungsbewertung von 500 % oder mehr abgeschlossen
description.polish: Zagrano jako SpaceY i osiągnięto wszystkie cele sponsorskie na poziomie wyzwania 500% lub wyższym.
description.russian: При игре за SpaceY выполнены все поставленные организатором задачи при уровне сложности 500% и выше
description.schinese: 已使用太空人，在挑战等级至少500%的情况下完成所有赞助者目标
description.spanish: Como SpaceY, completa todos los objetivos de patrocinador en desafíos de 500 % o superior
description.turkish: SpaceY olarak oynandı ve %500 veya daha yüksek zorluk derecesine sahip oyunda tüm Finansör Hedefleri tamamlandı

displayName.schinese: 吃得苦中苦，方为人上人

description.brazilian: Jogou com a Rússia e teve 500 Colonos com avaliação de desafio de 500% ou superior
description.english: Played as Russia and had 500 colonists on challenge rating 500% or higher
description.french: A joué la Russie et a eu 500 colons sur un challenge fixé à 500 % ou plus
description.german: Mit Russland über 500 Kolonisten auf einer Herausforderungsbewertung von 500 % oder höher verfügt
description.polish: Zagrano jako Rosja i uzyskano 500 kolonistów na poziomie wyzwania 500% lub wyższym.
description.russian: При игре за Россию в колонии поселилось 500 колонистов при уровне сложности 500% и выше
description.schinese: 已使用俄罗斯，在挑战等级至少500%的情况下拥有500位殖民地居民
description.spanish: Como Rusia, tuviste 500 colonos en desafíos de 500 % o superior
description.turkish: Rusya olarak oynandı ve %500 veya daha yüksek zorluk derecesine sahip oyunda 500 kolonist sahibi olundu

description.brazilian: Jogou com a Igreja da Nova Arca e teve 250 colonos com +70 de Conforto antes do Sol 100
description.english: Played as Church of the new Ark and had 250 Colonists at 70+ Comfort before Sol 100
description.french: A joué l'Église de la Nouvelle Arche et eu 250 colons avec un Confort de plus de 70 avant Sol 100
description.german: Mit der Kirche der neuen Arche vor Sol 100 über 250 Kolonisten mit Komfort von 70+ verfügt
description.polish: Zagrano jako Kościół Nowej Arki i uzyskano 250 kolonistów o poziomie wygody min. 70 przed solem 100.
description.russian: При игре за церковь «Новый ковчег» в первые 99 солов уровень комфорта 250 колонистов достиг 70
description.schinese: 已使用新方舟教，在第100个太阳日前拥有舒适度不低于70的250位殖民地居民
description.spanish: Como la Iglesia del Nuevo Arca, tuviste 250 colonos con más de 70 de comodidad antes del Sol 100
description.turkish: Nuh'un Yeni Gemisi Kilisesi olarak oynandı ve 100. Sol'dan önce 70+ konfor sahibi 250 kolonist sahibi olundu

description.brazilian: Jogou com o Japão e treinou 200 especialistas antes do Sol 100
description.english: Played as Japan and trained 200 specialists before Sol 100
description.french: A joué le Japon et a entraîné 200 spécialistes avant le Sol 100
description.german: Mit Japan vor Sol 100 200 Spezialisten ausgebildet
description.polish: Zagrano jako Japonia i wyszkolono 200 specjalistów przed solem 100.
description.russian: При игре за Японию в первые 99 солов обучено 200 специалистов
description.schinese: 已使用日本，在第100个太阳日前训练200名专家
description.spanish: Como Japón, entrenaste 200 especialistas antes del Sol 100
description.turkish: Japonya olarak oynandı ve 100. Sol'dan önce 200 uzman yetiştirildi

description.brazilian: Jogou com o Brasil e converteu 2.000 Resíduos de Rochas em Metas Raros antes do Sol 100
description.english: Played as Brazil and converted 2000 Waste Rock to Rare Metals before Sol 100
description.french: A joué le Brésil et a converti 2 000 Roches Stériles en Métaux Rares avant le Sol 100
description.german: Mit Brasilien vor Sol 100 2.000 Gesteinsabfälle in Edelmetalle umgewandelt
description.polish: Zagrano jako Brazylia i przerobiono 2000 odpadów skalnych na rzadkie metale przed solem 100.
description.russian: При игре за Бразилию в первые 99 солов 2000 ед. шлака переработано в редкие металлы
description.schinese: 已使用巴西，在第100个太阳日前将2000单位矿渣转化为稀有金属
description.spanish: Como Brasil, convertiste 2000 unidades de roca residual en metales raros antes del Sol 100
description.turkish: Brezilya olarak oynandı ve 100. Sol'dan önce 2.000 atık kaya, nadir metale dönüştürüldü

description.brazilian: Fez chover água em Marte
description.french: Pluie d'eau sur Mars
description.german: Wasser hatte auf dem Mars geregnet
description.polish: Doczekano się czystego deszczu na Marsie
description.schinese: 已在火星上降下淡水雨
description.spanish: Hiciste que llueva agua en Marte

displayName.french: Il ne manque plus que des canards

description.brazilian: Obteve um lago com água líquida
description.english: Had a lake with liquid water
description.french: A constitué un lac d'eau liquide
description.german: Du verfügtest über einen See mit flüssigem Wasser
description.russian: На Марсе есть озеро с жидкой водой.
description.schinese: 已拥有一片液态水湖泊
description.spanish: Creaste un lago de agua líquida
description.turkish: Sıvı su ile dolu bir göl oluşturuldu

description.brazilian: Enfrentou as Chuvas Tóxicas
description.french: A subi des pluies toxiques
description.schinese: 已挺过毒雨
description.spanish: Soportaste las lluvias tóxicas

description.brazilian: Atingiu o máximo de todos os Parâmetros de Terraformação
description.french: A monté au max tous les paramètres de terraformation
description.polish: Doprowadzono wszystkie parametry terraformingu do maksimum
description.schinese: 已使所有地球化参数达到最大值
description.spanish: Maximizaste todos los parámetros de terraformación
description.turkish: Tüm dünyalaştırma parametreleri maks. seviyeye çıkarıldı

description.brazilian: Construiu uma Cidade Capital
description.french: A construit une capitale
description.schinese: 已建造首都
description.spanish: Construiste una ciudad capital

description.brazilian: Visitou 3 asteroides ao mesmo tempo
description.french: A visité 3 Astéroïdes simultanément
description.schinese: 已同时造访3颗小行星
